body: @Lakitu He says several times throughout that it's safe to come inside because she hasn't had her period yet.  Then at the very end he makes a joke about how they've done it so much she'll definitely get pregnant, and she says herself "It's fine. I still haven't had my period yet." and then it shows a positive home pregnancy test in the trash.  That's why it's called trap of love.  She's been lying about it so he'll keep doing it.
I could care less about a translation but some context so I can interpret the ending would be nice. Still a damn good doujin though.
We all gonna die someday, so I will still ask for translation
@Aimed Kawarazaki why not read the fucking tags?
This is so good, more please!
